text:
Hello everyone. My name is Folasade. 

I am very good at communicating technical concepts in a simple and clear way that generates qualified leads. 

I’m looking to take on some freelance writing and/or a new full time role.

Kindly reach out if you’d like to work together :blush:

elements.text: Hello everyone. My name is Folasade.
I am very good at communicating technical concepts in a simple and clear way that generates qualified leads.
I’m looking to take on some freelance writing and/or a new full time role.
Kindly reach out if you’d like to work together

Hey, folks. I am looking for content writing opportunities as a freelancer. I have over 4.5 years of experience in the field of media and communications. Worked as a journalist as well as an editor with reputed media organizations. I have written on niches like education, health, social causes, environment and politics. I am happy to share my profile and work samples if needed. Any leads would be helpful and appreciated. Regards, Sushmita

attachments.fallback: [March 16th, 2022 8:13 PM] sushmita.ghosh2607: Hey, folks. I am looking for content writing opportunities as a freelancer. I have over 4.5 years of experience in the field of media and communications. Worked as a journalist as well as an editor with reputed media organizations. I have written on niches like education, health, social causes, environment and politics. I am happy to share my profile and work samples if needed. Any leads would be helpful and appreciated. Regards, Sushmita :slightly_smiling_face:

text:
Are you a church or Christian non-profit (like camps, programs, etc.) looking for help with your content marketing?

I know there might be a slim chance of someone in this niche also playing around here on Superpath, but I wanted to throw it out there and see if anyone wants to connect!

I served as a Student Ministries Pastor for 4 years before diving into freelance writing and then content marketing, so I would love an opportunity to write in the Christian ministry field again.

Feel free to DM me directly if this sounds like you (or if you know someone who might be a good connection)!
